member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Load
member.summary: A module that has seven 3Amp 50V digital switches for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer.

example.para: The following example uses a object to toggle pins on the module. These outputs could control high current loads, such as relays, motors, solenoids, or high current LEDs.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Load.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.
